General.Name: Sunshine Metal Limited
General.Description: Sunshine Metal Limited engages in the exploration and development of gold and copper mineral projects in Queensland. The company holds a 100% interest in the Triumph gold project covering an area of 138 square kilometers with 2 exploration permits located in the Northern New England Orogen; Hodgkinson gold project consisting of 365 square kilometers with 6 granted EPMs; and the Investigator copper project comprising two granted exploration permits covering an area of 217 square kilometers located in the Mt Isa Inlier; and Ravenswood West project consisting of 8 exploration permits that cover an area of 668 square kilometers. The company was formerly known as Sunshine Gold Limited and changed its name to Sunshine Metal Limited in July 2023. Sunshine Metal Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Garbutt, Australia.
